element.name: size
element.handler: if [ $size == 0 ] ; then /usr/local/bin/sdb cfg.report-storage-size-gb=None; else /usr/local/bin/sdb cfg.report-storage-size-gb=$size; fi;
element.help-string: size in GB, 0 reset to default

sequence.name: show
sequence.handler: size=`/usr/local/bin/sdb -ne cfg.report-storage-size-gb`; if [ $size ]; then ((size = size * 1073741824)); else size=`/usr/local/bin/sdb -ne cfg.report-storage-size`; if [ -z $size ]; then size=209715200; fi; fi; echo $size;

element.name: limit
element.handler: if [ $limit == 0 ] ; then /usr/local/bin/sdb cfg.report.max-keys-limit=None; else /usr/local/bin/sdb cfg.report.max-keys-limit=$limit; fi;

sequence.name: show
sequence.handler: max_keys=`/usr/local/bin/sdb -ne cfg.report.max-keys-limit`; if [ -z $max_keys ]; then max_keys=500; model=`/usr/local/bin/sdb -ne cfg.platform.model`; if [ $model == 'M-100' ]; then max_keys=25; else mode=`/usr/local/bin/sdb -ne cfg.cms.mode`; if [ $mode ]; then if [ $mode == 'legacy' ]; then max_keys=25; fi; fi; fi; fi; ((max_keys=max_keys*1000)); echo $max_keys;

element.name: limit
element.handler: if [ $limit == 0 ] ; then /usr/local/bin/sdb cfg.report.min-keys-limit=None; else /usr/local/bin/sdb cfg.report.min-keys-limit=$limit; fi;

sequence.name: show
sequence.handler: min_keys=`/usr/local/bin/sdb -ne cfg.report.min-keys-limit`; if [ -z $min_keys ]; then min_keys=10; model=`/usr/local/bin/sdb -ne cfg.platform.model`; if [ $model == 'M-100' ]; then min_keys=5; else mode=`/usr/local/bin/sdb -ne cfg.cms.mode`; if [ $mode ]; then if [ $mode == 'legacy' ]; then min_keys=5; fi; fi; fi; fi; ((min_keys=min_keys*1000)); echo $min_keys;

sequence.name: grep
sequence.help-string: Searches file for lines containing a pattern match

element.help-string: Invert the sense of matching, to select non-matching lines

element.help-string: Prefix each line of output with the line number

element.help-string: Suppress the prefixing of filenames on output

element.help-string: Print a count of matching lines for each input file

element.name: max-count
element.help-string: Stop reading a file after NUM matching lines

element.name: context
element.help-string: Print NUM lines of output context

element.help-string: Print NUM lines of leading context before matching lines

element.name: after-context
element.help-string: Print NUM lines of trailing context after matching lines

sequence.name: cms-traceroute

element.name: first-ttl
element.help-string: time-to-live used in the first outgoing probe packet

element.name: max-ttl
element.help-string: Set the max time-to-live (max number of hops)

element.name: port
element.help-string: Set the base port number used in probes (default udp/33434 tcp/80 icmp/1)

element.name: wait
element.help-string: Set number of seconds to wait for a response

element.name: pause
element.help-string: Set the time (in milliseconds) to pause between probes

element.help-string: Specify a loose source route gateway (8 maximum)

element.help-string: Don't attempt to print addresses symbolically

element.help-string: Bypass routing tables and send directly to a host

element.name: source
element.help-string: Use specified source address in outgoing probe packets

element.name: host
element.help-string: Hostname or IP address of remote host
